0.name: Ciri
0.ability: Whenever you lose a round, return this unit from the battlefield to your hand.
0.ability_html: Whenever you lose a round, return this unit from the battlefield to your hand.
0.flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

1.name: Geralt: Igni
1.ability: Deploy, Melee: Destroy the highest unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 15 or more power.
1.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Destroy the highest unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 15 or more power.
1.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
1.flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

2.name: Geralt of Rivia
2.ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy with 8 or more power.
2.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy with 8 or more power.
2.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
2.flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

3.name: Regis
3.ability: Deploy: Damage all enemies on a row by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all enemies on a row by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
3.flavor: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.

4.name: Regis: Higher Vampire
4.ability: Deploy, Melee: Drain all boosts from an enemy.
4.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Drain all boosts from an enemy.
4.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Drain: Deal damage and boost self by the same amount.
4.flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

5.name: Triss Merigold
5.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy by its power.
5.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy by its power.
5.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
5.flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

6.name: Villentretenmerth
6.ability: After 2 turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
6.ability_html: After 2 turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
6.flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

7.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
7.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units by 2.
7.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage all other units by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units by 2.
7.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
7.flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

8.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
8.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy, Ranged: Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Spawn and play Duda: Agitator. Deploy, Ranged: Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
8.flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

9.name: Ciri: Dash
9.ability: After 4 turns, on turn start, draw a card.
9.ability_html: After 4 turns, on turn start, draw a card.
9.flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

10.name: Geralt: Aard
10.ability: Deploy, Melee: Damage 3 enemies by 2, and if possible, move them to the ranged row.
10.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage 3 enemies by 2, and if possible, move them to the ranged row.
10.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
10.flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

11.name: Avallac'h: Sage
11.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your deck.
11.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your deck.
11.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
11.flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

12.name: Yennefer: Conjurer
12.ability:
Order: Damage the highest enemy unit(s) by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
12.ability_html: Order: Damage the highest enemy unit(s) by 1. Cooldown: 1.
12.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
12.flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

13.name: Dudu
13.ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
13.flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

14.name: Eskel
14.ability: Deploy: Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck to this row.
14.ability_html: Deploy: Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck to this row.
14.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
14.flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

15.name: Vesemir
15.ability: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck to this row.
15.ability_html: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck to this row.
15.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
15.flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

16.name: Lambert
16.ability: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck to this row.
16.ability_html: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck to this row.
16.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
16.flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

17.name: Myrgtabrakke
17.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy by 2. 
Charge: 2.
17.ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy by 2. Charge: 2.
17.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
17.flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

18.name: Ocvist
18.ability_html: Order: Damage all enemies by 1.
18.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
18.flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

19.name: Olgierd von Everec
19.ability_html: Order: Heal self. Cooldown: 1.
19.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
19.flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

20.name: Operator
20.ability: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
20.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
20.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
20.flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

21.name: Prize-Winning Cow
21.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

22.name: Roach
22.ability: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
22.ability_html: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
22.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
22.flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

23.name: Johnny
23.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
23.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 2. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
23.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
23.flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

24.name: Sarah
24.ability:
Order: Boost a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
24.ability_html: Order: Boost a unit by 2. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
24.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.

25.name: King of Beggars
25.ability: Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
25.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
25.flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

26.name: Cyprian Wiley
26.ability: Deploy: Banish a unit with 3 power or less.
26.ability_html: Deploy: Banish a unit with 3 power or less.
26.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
26.flavor: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo The Cleaver Varese and the King of Beggars.

27.name: Iris von Everec
27.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy artifact.
Deploy, Ranged: Clear all row effects from your side.
27.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy artifact. Deploy, Ranged: Clear all row effects from your side.
27.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
27.flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.

28.name: Unicorn
28.ability: Deploy: Boost a unit by 4. If you have Chironex in hand, double that amount.
28.ability_html: Deploy: Boost a unit by 4. If you have Chironex in hand, double that amount.
28.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
28.flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.

29.name: Chironex
29.ability: Deploy: Damage a unit by 4. If you have Unicorn in hand, double that amount.
29.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a unit by 4. If you have Unicorn in hand, double that amount.
29.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
29.flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.

30.name: Duda: Companion
30.ability: Boost all units on a row by 2.
30.ability_html: Boost all units on a row by 2.
30.flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.

31.name: Duda: Agitator
31.ability: Damage all units on a row by 2.
31.ability_html: Damage all units on a row by 2.
31.flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.

32.name: Fiend
32.ability: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
32.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
32.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
32.flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

33.name: Ragh Nar Roog
33.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
Every turn, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
33.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
Every turn, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
33.flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.

34.name: The Last Wish
34.ability: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.ability_html: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
34.flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

35.name: Decoy
35.ability: Shuffle an ally on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.ability_html: Shuffle an ally on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

36.name: Merigold's Hailstorm
36.flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.

37.name: Skellige Storm
37.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 2 turns, on turn start, damage all units on this row by 1.
37.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 2 turns, on turn start, damage all units on this row by 1.
37.flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

38.name: Stammelford's Tremors
38.flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

39.name: Dimeritium Bomb
39.flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

40.name: White Frost
40.flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

41.name: Commander's Horn
41.flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

42.name: Vaedermakar
42.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy, Ranged: Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
42.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Increase all row effect durations by 1. Deploy, Ranged: Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
42.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
42.flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.

43.name: Alzur's Double–Cross
43.ability: Play the highest unit from your deck.
43.ability_html: Play the highest unit from your deck.
43.flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.

44.name: Alzur's Thunder
44.flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

45.name: Biting Frost
45.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the lowest unit on this row by 2.
45.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the lowest unit on this row by 2.
45.flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

46.name: Clear Skies
46.ability: Clear all row effects from your side.
46.ability_html: Clear all row effects from your side.
46.flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

47.name: Impenetrable Fog
47.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
47.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
47.flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.

48.name: Manticore Venom
48.flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.

49.name: Adrenaline Rush
49.ability: Give or remove Resilience from a unit.
49.ability_html: Give or remove Resilience from a unit.
49.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the board at round end, then restores it to base power if boosted.
49.flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

50.name: Epidemic
50.flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.

51.name: Scorch
51.flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.

52.name: Swallow
52.flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

53.name: Thunderbolt
53.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 2. 
Charge: 3.
53.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 2. Charge: 3.
53.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
53.flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

54.name: Torrential Rain
54.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage 2 random units on the row by 1.
54.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage 2 random units on the row by 1.
54.flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

55.name: An Craite Warcrier
55.ability: Deploy: Boost self by the amount an enemy is damaged.
55.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the amount an enemy is damaged.
55.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
55.flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.

56.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
56.ability: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.ability_html: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.

57.name: Renew
57.ability: Play a unit from your graveyard.
57.ability_html: Play a unit from your graveyard.

58.name: Dimeritium Shackles
58.ability: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.ability_html: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
58.flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.

59.name: Mardroeme
59.ability: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.ability_html: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…

60.name: Bloody Baron
60.ability: Order: Double an allied unit's Charge count.
60.ability_html: Order: Double an allied unit's Charge count.
60.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
60.flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.

61.name: Vernon Roche
61.ability:
Spying.
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.ability_html: Spying. Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.keyword_html: Spying: Status for a unit played on or moved to the opposite side of the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
61.flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.

62.name: John Natalis
62.ability: Melee: While this unit is on the battlefield, all allied units with Orders gain Zeal.
62.ability_html: Melee: While this unit is on the battlefield, all allied units with Orders gain Zeal.
62.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
62.flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

63.name: Triss: Butterflies
63.ability: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
63.ability_html: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
63.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
63.flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!

64.name: Keira Metz
64.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Play a Spell from your deck.
64.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Play a Spell from your deck.
64.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
64.flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.

65.name: Dandelion
65.ability: Ranged: Whenever an ally gains a Charge, boost it by 1.
65.ability_html: Ranged: Whenever an ally gains a Charge, boost it by 1.
65.keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
65.flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.

66.name: Priscilla
66.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Give a unit 1 Charge. 
Cooldown: 1.
66.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Give a unit 1 Charge. Cooldown: 1.
66.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
66.flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.

67.name: Thaler
67.ability:
Deploy: Remove all Charges from an enemy unit and give them to Thaler.
Order: Give 1 Charge to an allied unit.
Charge: 0.
67.ability_html: Deploy: Remove all Charges from an enemy unit and give them to Thaler. Order: Give 1 Charge to an allied unit. Charge: 0.
67.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
67.flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…

68.name: Ves
68.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 4.
Order: Give an ally Zeal.
68.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 4. Order: Give an ally Zeal.
68.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
68.flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.

69.name: Síle de Tansarville
69.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Order: Damage an enemy by 2.
69.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2. Order: Damage an enemy by 2.
69.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
69.flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

70.name: Sabrina Glevissig
70.ability:
Spying. 
Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
70.ability_html: Spying. Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
70.keyword_html: Spying: Status for a unit played on or moved to the opposite side of the battlefield. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
70.flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.

71.name: Dethmold
71.ability: Order, Ranged: Damage an enemy by the amount Dethmold is boosted.
71.ability_html: Order, Ranged: Damage an enemy by the amount Dethmold is boosted.
71.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
71.flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…

72.name: Prince Stennis
72.ability: Deploy: Boost an ally by 2 and give it 2 Charges.
72.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 2 and give it 2 Charges.
72.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
72.flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.

73.name: Princess Pavetta
73.ability: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
73.ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
73.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
73.flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…

74.name: Margarita Laux-Antille
74.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Spend 3 Charges to Lock an enemy unit.
Charge: 3.
74.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Spend 3 Charges to Lock an enemy unit. Charge: 3.
74.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
74.flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.

75.name: Nenneke
75.ability:
Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 3.
75.ability_html: Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. Charge: 3.
75.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
75.flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.

76.name: Odrin
76.ability: Deploy: Give 1 Charge to all allied units.
76.ability_html: Deploy: Give 1 Charge to all allied units.
76.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
76.flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.

77.name: Kaedweni Sergeant
77.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an ally by 1. 
Charge: 2.
77.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Boost an ally by 1. Charge: 2.
77.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
77.flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!

78.name: Cleaver
78.ability: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for every card in your hand.
78.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for every card in your hand.
78.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
78.flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.

79.name: Ballista
79.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
79.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1.
79.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
79.flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.

80.name: Reinforced Ballista
80.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
80.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 2. Charge: 1.
80.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
80.flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.

81.name: Trebuchet
81.ability:
Order, Ranged: Damage a unit by 1. If it was destroyed, damage units adjacent to it by 1.
Charge: 1.
81.ability_html: Order, Ranged: Damage a unit by 1. If it was destroyed, damage units adjacent to it by 1. Charge: 1.
81.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
81.flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

82.name: Siege Tower
82.ability:
Order, Melee: Boost adjacent allies by 1. 
Charge: 1.
82.ability_html: Order, Melee: Boost adjacent allies by 1. Charge: 1.
82.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
82.flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.

83.name: Siege Support
83.ability: Deploy: Give 2 Charges to a Machine ally.
83.ability_html: Deploy: Give 2 Charges to a Machine ally.
83.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
83.flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.\nDo what by the what now?

84.name: Blue Stripes Scout
84.ability: Deploy, Melee: Spawn a copy of a bronze ally at the bottom of your deck.
84.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Spawn a copy of a bronze ally at the bottom of your deck.
84.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
84.flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.

85.name: Blue Stripes Commando
85.ability: Order: Summon a copy of this unit from your deck to this row.
85.ability_html: Order: Summon a copy of this unit from your deck to this row.
85.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
85.flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.

86.name: Field Medic
86.ability_html: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 2.
86.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
86.flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.

87.name: Dun Banner
87.ability:
Deploy: Gain Zeal if played adjacent to 2 Soldiers.
Order: Damage an enemy by 3.
87.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Zeal if played adjacent to 2 Soldiers. Order: Damage an enemy by 3.
87.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
87.flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.

88.name: Kaedweni Cavalry
88.ability: Deploy, Melee: Remove all Charges from an enemy, then damage it by the amount removed.
88.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Remove all Charges from an enemy, then damage it by the amount removed.
88.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
88.flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?

89.name: Reinforced Trebuchet
89.ability: Ranged: Every turn, on turn end, damage a random enemy on the ranged row by 1.
89.ability_html: Ranged: Every turn, on turn end, damage a random enemy on the ranged row by 1.
89.keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
89.flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.

90.name: Temerian Infantry
90.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
90.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
90.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
90.flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!

91.name: Siege Master
91.ability: Whenever a Machine is placed on this row, give it Zeal.
91.ability_html: Whenever a Machine is placed on this row, give it Zeal.
91.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.

92.name: Botchling
92.ability:
Every turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy by 1. 
Order: Transfrom into Lubberkin.
92.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy by 1. Order: Transfrom into Lubberkin.
92.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
92.flavor: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper – else they'll come back to haunt you.

93.name: Lubberkin
93.ability:
Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest ally by 1. 
Order: Transform into Botchling.
93.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest ally by 1. Order: Transform into Botchling.
93.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
93.flavor: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.

94.name: Vicovaro Novice
94.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
94.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
94.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
94.flavor: Mages in Nilfgaard are disposable. If one disappoints the Emperor, a dozen others await to provide what he requires.

95.name: Reinforcements
95.ability: Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit and Summon it to this row.
95.ability_html: Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit and Summon it to this row.
95.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
95.flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!

96.name: Eredin Bréacc Glas
96.ability: Order: Boost a unit by 4 and give it Immune.
96.ability_html: Order: Boost a unit by 4 and give it Immune.
96.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Immune: Cannot be targeted.
96.flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.

97.name: Ge'els
97.ability: Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
97.ability_html: Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
97.keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
97.flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.

98.name: Draug
98.ability: Deploy: Transform all Human allies into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
98.ability_html: Deploy: Transform all Human allies into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
98.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
98.flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.

99.name: Imlerith's Wrath
99.ability: Damage an enemy by the power of your highest ally.
99.ability_html: Damage an enemy by the power of your highest ally.
99.flavor: He boasted that no weapon would ever pierce his armor. And he was right — even in death.

100.name: Woodland Spirit
100.ability: Order: Boost a unit in your hand by 8.
100.ability_html: Order: Boost a unit in your hand by 8.
100.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
100.flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.

101.name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
101.ability: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power copy of a unit from your hand and Summon it to this row.
101.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power copy of a unit from your hand and Summon it to this row.
101.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
101.flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.

102.name: Avallac'h
102.ability: Order: Give an allied unit Immune.
102.ability_html: Order: Give an allied unit Immune.
102.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Immune: Cannot be targeted.

103.name: Caretaker
103.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your graveyard.
103.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your graveyard.
103.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
103.flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.

104.name: Kayran
104.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Consume an ally.
Charge: 3.
104.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Consume an ally. Charge: 3.
104.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
104.flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.

105.name: Miruna
105.ability: Deathwish: Seize an enemy with 3 or less power.
105.ability_html: Deathwish: Seize an enemy with 3 or less power.
105.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard. Seize: Move an enemy to the opposite row.
105.flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…

106.name: Arachas Behemoth
106.ability: Spawn 2 Arachas Drones and Summon them to this row, then boost all other Insectoids on this row by 1.
106.ability_html: Spawn 2 Arachas Drones and Summon them to this row, then boost all other Insectoids on this row by 1.
106.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
106.flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.

107.name: Mourntart
107.ability: Order: Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
107.ability_html: Order: Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
107.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
107.flavor: Most grave hags feed on rotten remains dug out of graves. Yet some sneak into huts, steal children, kill the elderly and in general make very undesirable neighbors.

108.name: Abaya
108.ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
108.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
108.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
108.flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!

109.name: Frightener: Dormant
109.ability: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
109.ability_html: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
109.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

110.name: Morvudd
110.ability: Deploy: Boost all Beast allies by 1.
110.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Beast allies by 1.
110.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
110.flavor: An unusual fiend specimen found on Ard Skellig. Unusually picky in terms of food.

111.name: Whispess
111.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play Brewess or Weavess.
111.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2. Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play Brewess or Weavess.
111.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
111.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.

112.name: Brewess
112.ability:
Deploy: Consume 1 allied unit(s).
Increase the number of targets by 1 whenever you play Whispess or Weavess.
112.ability_html: Deploy: Consume 1 allied unit(s). Increase the number of targets by 1 whenever you play Whispess or Weavess.
112.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.
112.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.

113.name: Weavess
113.ability:
Deploy: Boost an ally by 2.
Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play Whispess or Brewess.
113.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 2. Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play Whispess or Brewess.
113.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
113.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.

114.name: Imperial Manticore
114.ability_html: Deathwish: Destroy the lowest enemy.
114.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
114.flavor: One of the world's oldest and deadliest monsters. I used to feel excitement at moments like this. Now the beast is only an obstacle in my way. Its meat and hot blood will help me survive this icy hell.

115.name: Colossal Ifrit
115.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1.
Cooldown: 3.
115.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1. Cooldown: 3.
115.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
115.flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.

116.name: Nekker Warrior
116.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played.
116.flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.

117.name: Ice Giant
117.flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

118.name: Primordial D'ao
118.flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

119.name: Nithral
119.ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact. If you control the highest unit, damage units adjacent to that artifact by 2.
119.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact. If you control the highest unit, damage units adjacent to that artifact by 2.
119.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
119.flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.

120.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
120.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy.
120.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed. Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy.
120.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
120.flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

121.name: Toad Prince
121.ability: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit with 3 or less power.
121.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit with 3 or less power.
121.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.
121.flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.

122.name: Celaeno Harpy
122.ability_html: Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
122.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.
122.flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.

124.name: Foglet
124.ability: Deathwish: Summon a copy of this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
124.ability_html: Deathwish: Summon a copy of this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
124.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
124.flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.

125.name: Ancient Foglet
125.ability: Deathwish: Summon this unit from the graveyard to the same row, boost it by 4, and give it Doomed.
125.ability_html: Deathwish: Summon this unit from the graveyard to the same row, boost it by 4, and give it Doomed.
125.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.
125.flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…

126.name: Wyvern
126.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
126.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
126.flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

127.name: Arachas Drone
127.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.
127.flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.

128.name: Nekker
128.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
128.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
128.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
128.flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

129.name: Ghoul
129.ability: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit in your graveyard.
129.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit in your graveyard.
129.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.
129.flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.

130.name: Griffin
130.ability: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no units, destroy self.
130.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no units, destroy self.
130.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
130.flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.

131.name: Vran Warrior
131.ability: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, damage a random enemy by 1.
131.ability_html: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, damage a random enemy by 1.
131.flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.

132.name: Wild Hunt Warrior
132.ability: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for each Wild Hunt unit on this row.
132.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for each Wild Hunt unit on this row.
132.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.

133.name: Wild Hunt Rider
133.ability: Deploy: If you control the highest unit, Summon a copy of Wild Hunt Rider from your deck to this row.
133.ability_html: Deploy: If you control the highest unit, Summon a copy of Wild Hunt Rider from your deck to this row.
133.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
133.flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.

134.name: Predatory Dive
134.ability: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
134.ability_html: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
134.flavor: Afraid for the lives, the residents of Hengfors cowered behind thick city walls. A lot of good that did them...

135.name: Drowner
135.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2 and move it to the other row.
135.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2 and move it to the other row.
135.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
135.flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.

136.name: Harpy
136.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.
136.flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.

137.name: Harpy Egg
137.ability: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to a random allied row.
137.ability_html: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to a random allied row.
137.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
137.flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.

138.name: Wild Hunt Hound
138.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If you control the highest unit, damage by 3 instead.
138.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If you control the highest unit, damage by 3 instead.
138.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
138.flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.

139.name: Wolf Pack
139.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
139.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
139.flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.

140.name: Enraged Ifrit
140.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 4.
140.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
140.flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…

141.name: Frenzied D'ao
141.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact.
141.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
141.flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.

142.name: Maerolorn
142.ability: Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
142.ability_html: Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
142.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
142.flavor: No gate nor wall can stop them. Just one tiny crack — that's all they need...

143.name: Imperial Golem
143.ability: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
143.ability_html: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
143.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
143.flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…

144.name: Old Speartip
144.flavor: Oh, you're in a heap of trouble now…

145.name: Hideous Feast
145.ability: Damage an enemy by 3 and boost an ally by 3.
145.ability_html: Damage an enemy by 3 and boost an ally by 3.
145.flavor: The fool paid heed to superstition, stuffed his ears with wax and didn't hear the warnings. He ran his ship straight into the rocks.

146.name: Wyvern Scale Shield
146.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
146.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
146.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
146.flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.

147.name: Arachas Nest
147.ability: Spawn 4 1-power Arachas Drones and Summon them to an allied row.
147.ability_html: Spawn 4 1-power Arachas Drones and Summon them to an allied row.
147.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
147.flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!

148.name: Saesenthessis
148.ability:
Immune.
Order: Remove this unit's Immune status for the remainder of the turn.
148.ability_html: Immune. Order: Remove this unit's Immune status for the remainder of the turn.
148.keyword_html: Immune: Cannot be targeted. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
148.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

149.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
149.ability:
Deploy: Boost all other Elf allies by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
149.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all other Elf allies by 1. Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
149.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
149.flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.

150.name: Iorveth
150.ability: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
150.ability_html: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
150.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
150.flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.

151.name: Milva
151.ability:
Immune.
Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
151.ability_html: Immune. Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
151.flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.

152.name: Zoltan Chivay
152.ability: Deploy, Melee: Destroy a unit with power less than or equal to the number of Dwarf allies.
152.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Destroy a unit with power less than or equal to the number of Dwarf allies.
152.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
152.flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.

153.name: Aglaïs
153.ability: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
153.ability_html: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
153.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
153.flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.

154.name: Ithlinne Aegli
154.ability: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
154.ability_html: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
154.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
154.flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.

155.name: Schirrú
155.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Destroy all other units with the same power as Schirrú.
155.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Destroy all other units with the same power as Schirrú.
155.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
155.flavor: Time to look death in the face.

156.name: Dennis Cranmer
156.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Boost adjacent units by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units on this row by 1.
156.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Boost adjacent units by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units on this row by 1.
156.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
156.flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.

157.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
157.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Destroy an artifact.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost a unit by 3.
157.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an artifact. Deploy, Ranged: Boost a unit by 3.
157.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
157.flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

158.name: Yaevinn
158.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Elf ally.
158.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Elf ally.
158.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
158.flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

159.name: Toruviel
159.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Damage enemies at the ends of a row by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Damage all enemies on a row by 1.
159.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage enemies at the ends of a row by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Damage all enemies on a row by 1.
159.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
159.flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.

160.name: Vrihedd Dragoon
160.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Move an enemy unit to their other row.
Deploy, Ranged: Move an allied unit to your other row.
160.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Move an enemy unit to their other row. Deploy, Ranged: Move an allied unit to your other row.
160.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
160.flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.

161.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen
161.ability: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
161.ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
161.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
161.flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

162.name: Barclay Els
162.ability: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1 for each Dwarf ally.
162.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1 for each Dwarf ally.
162.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
162.flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!

163.name: Morenn
163.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Lock a unit.
163.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Lock a unit.
163.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
163.flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.

164.name: Braenn
164.ability:
Deploy: If you control 2 or more Dryads, gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy by 1.
Charge: 3.
164.ability_html: Deploy: If you control 2 or more Dryads, gain Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy by 1. Charge: 3.
164.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
164.flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.

165.name: Malena
165.ability:
Order: Move a unit to the other row on its side.
Cooldown: 2.
165.ability_html: Order: Move a unit to the other row on its side. Cooldown: 2.
165.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
165.flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.

166.name: Aelirenn
166.ability: If on turn end you control 5 or more Elf allies, Summon this unit from your deck to the melee row.
166.ability_html: If on turn end you control 5 or more Elf allies, Summon this unit from your deck to the melee row.
166.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
166.flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.

167.name: Sheldon Skaggs
167.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by this unit's power.
167.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by this unit's power.
167.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
167.flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

168.name: Yarpen Zigrin
168.ability: Every turn, on turn end, if there are no allied units on the battlefield, boost self by 3.
168.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, if there are no allied units on the battlefield, boost self by 3.
168.flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.

169.name: Ele'yas
169.ability: Deploy: Damage all damaged units by 1 and boost all boosted units by 1.
169.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all damaged units by 1 and boost all boosted units by 1.
169.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
169.flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.

170.name: Hawker Healer
170.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Boost an allied unit by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Heal an allied unit by 4.
170.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Boost an allied unit by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Heal an allied unit by 4.
170.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
170.flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.

171.name: Vrihedd Brigade
171.ability:
Deploy: Damage a random enemy by 2.
Whenever Vrihedd Brigade is moved to the other row, repeat its Deploy ability.
171.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a random enemy by 2. Whenever Vrihedd Brigade is moved to the other row, repeat its Deploy ability.
171.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

172.name: Vrihedd Officer
172.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 3.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost an ally by 3.
172.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 3. Deploy, Ranged: Boost an ally by 3.
172.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
172.flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

173.name: Dol Blathanna Bomber
173.ability: Deploy: Damage a random enemy on each row by 2.
173.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a random enemy on each row by 2.
173.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
173.flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.

174.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
174.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3. If it survives, boost self by 1.
174.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3. If it survives, boost self by 1.
174.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
174.flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

175.name: Mahakam Defender
175.ability: Every turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
175.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
175.flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!

176.name: Vrihedd Sappers
176.ability: Deploy: If you have an Elf in your hand, destroy an enemy artifact.
176.ability_html: Deploy: If you have an Elf in your hand, destroy an enemy artifact.
176.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
176.flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

177.name: Waylay
177.ability: If there is an Elf ally on the battlefield, destroy a random enemy unit.
177.ability_html: If there is an Elf ally on the battlefield, destroy a random enemy unit.
177.flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.

178.name: Vrihedd Vanguard
178.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
178.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
178.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
178.flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.

179.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
179.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Damage 2 units by 1.
179.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2. Deploy, Ranged: Damage 2 units by 1.
179.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
179.flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

180.name: Dwarven Mercenary
180.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Dwarf.
180.ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Dwarf.
180.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
180.flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.

181.name: Hawker Support
181.ability: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
181.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
181.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
181.flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.

182.name: Elven Wardancer
182.ability: Deploy: If this unit is already boosted, damage an enemy by 3.
182.ability_html: Deploy: If this unit is already boosted, damage an enemy by 3.
182.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
182.flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!

183.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
183.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
183.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
183.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
183.flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.

184.name: Hawker Smuggler
184.ability: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
184.ability_html: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
184.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
184.flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

185.name: Blue Mountain Elite
185.ability: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 4 if there are no other units on its row.
185.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 4 if there are no other units on its row.
185.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
185.flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…

186.name: Mahakam Guard
186.ability: Deploy: Boost self by the number of Dwarf allies on the other row.
186.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the number of Dwarf allies on the other row.
186.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
186.flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.

187.name: Scoia'tael Neophyte
187.ability: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of this unit to the other allied row.
187.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of this unit to the other allied row.
187.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
187.flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.

188.name: Serpent Trap
188.ability: Ambush: Destroy the next special card played by your opponent before it triggers any abilities.
188.ability_html: Ambush: Destroy the next special card played by your opponent before it triggers any abilities.
188.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
188.flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.

189.name: Incinerating Trap
189.ability:
Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays by 5. 
Zeal.
Order: Flip over and damage a unit by 3.
189.ability_html: Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays by 5. Zeal. Order: Flip over and damage a unit by 3.
189.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
189.flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.

190.name: Hjalmar an Craite
190.ability: Deploy, Melee: Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy by its power.
190.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy by its power.
190.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
190.flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!

191.name: Ermion
191.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
191.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
191.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
191.flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.

192.name: Kambi
192.ability: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then force your opponent to do the same.
192.ability_html: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then force your opponent to do the same.
192.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
192.flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.

193.name: Birna Bran
193.ability: Deploy: Draw 2 cards, then Discard 2 cards.
193.ability_html: Deploy: Draw 2 cards, then Discard 2 cards.
193.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
193.flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.

194.name: Madman Lugos
194.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by twice the number of damaged enemies.
194.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by twice the number of damaged enemies.
194.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.

195.name: Coral
195.ability:
Order: Discard a card, then draw a card. 
Charge: 3.
Whenever a special card is Discarded, damage an enemy by 2.
195.ability_html: Order: Discard a card, then draw a card. Charge: 3. Whenever a special card is Discarded, damage an enemy by 2.
195.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
195.flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.

196.name: Wild Boar of the Sea
196.ability: Deploy, Melee: Damage all damaged enemies by 2.
196.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage all damaged enemies by 2.
196.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
196.flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…

197.name: Blueboy Lugos
197.ability: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
197.ability_html: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
197.flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.

198.name: Champion's Charge
198.ability:
Damage a unit by 5. 
Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
198.ability_html: Damage a unit by 5. Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
198.keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
198.flavor: At close range, trolls never use weapons. And why would they?

199.name: Djenge Frett
199.ability_html: Bloodthirst 1: Lock an enemy unit.
199.keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
199.flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.

200.name: Donar an Hindar
200.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy by 5 instead.
200.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy by 5 instead.
