422.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
422.flavor: Doomed to repeat the same day over and over again, just like the employees of Cianfanelli Bank.

423.name: Cursed Knight
423.ability: Deploy: Transform an allied unit that is not a Cursed Knight into a Cursed Knight without changing its power.
423.ability_html: Deploy: Transform an allied unit that is not a Cursed Knight into a Cursed Knight without changing its power.
423.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
423.flavor: He fights an endless war whose beginning he no longer remembers.

424.name: Ciri: Nova
424.ability: On turn start, if this is the only unit in your graveyard, Summon it to a random allied row.
424.ability_html: On turn start, if this is the only unit in your graveyard, Summon it to a random allied row.
424.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
424.flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.

425.name: Shupe's Day Off
425.ability:
Doomed.
If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
425.ability_html: Doomed. If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
425.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.
425.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

426.name: Forbidden Magic
426.ability: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Specter ally.
426.ability_html: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Specter ally.
426.flavor: Prohibited? Yes. Eliminated? Far from it.

427.name: Damned Sorceress
427.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3.
427.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
427.flavor: Sabrina's curse spared no one, not even her fellow practitioners.

428.name: Doppler
428.ability: Deploy: Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the total number of units in your hand which have the same primary category as that unit.
428.ability_html: Deploy: Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the total number of units in your hand which have the same primary category as that unit.
428.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
428.flavor: Humans despise dopplers so much, they feel mere execution does not suffice - so they tie any they catch to a stake, cover them in thick clay and bake them in a fire.

429.name: Sihil
429.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
Whenever Sihil destroys an enemy, increase Sihil's Order damage by 1 until moved from the battlefield.
429.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy by 1. Cooldown: 1. Whenever Sihil destroys an enemy, increase Sihil's Order damage by 1 until moved from the battlefield.
429.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
429.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

430.name: Bloody Flail
430.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy by Bloody Flail's Charge count, then remove all Charges.
Charge: 1.
Whenever an allied unit gains Charges, gain the same amount.
430.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy by Bloody Flail's Charge count, then remove all Charges. Charge: 1. Whenever an allied unit gains Charges, gain the same amount.
430.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
430.flavor: There are weapons banned in all the Northern Realms, for the wounds they deal are horrible beyond all imagining.

431.name: Bekker's Rockslide
431.flavor: All it takes is one pebble and we're all done for.

432.name: Glorious Hunt
432.ability: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
432.ability_html: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
432.flavor: By the gods' gonads, witcher, why'd you bring me this filth?! I want that beast's head! - that was a ploughin' figure of ploughin' speech!

433.name: Half-Elf Hunter
433.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each artifact you control.
433.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each artifact you control.
433.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
433.flavor: Hated by men, reviled by elves and always picked last during schoolyard games. No wonder half-elves tend to have a chip on their shoulder.

434.name: Dragon's Dream
434.ability:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
After 3 turns, on turn start, explode and damage all units on this row by 3.
434.ability_html:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
After 3 turns, on turn start, explode and damage all units on this row by 3.
434.flavor: In Zerrikania, dragon worship dominates every aspect of daily life. Thus it comes as no surprise they name weapons in their honor.

435.name: Elven Scout
435.ability: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
435.ability_html: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
435.flavor: They say elves leave no tracks in the snow, but if you ask me, they are just a pack of village idiots, babbling nonsense.

437.name: Yoana
437.ability:
Order: Heal an ally by 1.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever an adjacent unit takes damage.
437.ability_html: Order: Heal an ally by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever an adjacent unit takes damage.
437.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
437.flavor: No one'd ever think I could be a skilled armorer - a human, and a woman to boot. A dwarven blacksmith - that's another story…

438.name: Crushing Trap
438.ability:
Ambush: After 3 turns, on turn start, damage all enemy units on the row with the most units by 2. 
Zeal.
Order: Flip over and damage all units on a row by 1.
438.ability_html: Ambush: After 3 turns, on turn start, damage all enemy units on the row with the most units by 2. Zeal. Order: Flip over and damage all units on a row by 1.
438.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
438.flavor: When this knocks you down, you don't get up again.

439.name: Derran
439.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Move up to 3 cards from your deck to your graveyard.
439.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Move up to 3 cards from your deck to your graveyard.
439.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
439.flavor: Whatever caused this madness must have been terrifying…

440.name: Rock Barrage
440.ability: Damage an enemy by 4 and move it to the other row.
440.ability_html: Damage an enemy by 4 and move it to the other row.
440.flavor: Someday, when you are older, you could get hit by a boulder.

441.name: Vandergrift's Blade
441.ability: Whenever you play a Soldier on this row, boost it by 2.
441.ability_html: Whenever you play a Soldier on this row, boost it by 2.
441.flavor: Seltkirk shattered Vandergrift's sword during a knights' tourney in Ard Carraigh. Afterwards Vandergrift, enraged at his weapon's failure, ordered a new one forged, this time with powerful runestones enchanted into it.

442.name: Sabrina's Inferno
442.ability: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
442.ability_html: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
442.flavor: With her dying breath, Sabrina Glevissig cast a powerful curse that struck not only her executioners, but all who stood nearby.

443.name: Mahakam Horn
443.ability: Ambush: When your opponent passes, boost adjacent units by 4.
443.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent passes, boost adjacent units by 4.
443.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
443.flavor: Once upon a time, Mahakam held a horn-blowing contest. That day the dwarves made an important discovery: loud noises and snow-capped peaks do not play well together.

444.name: Mastercrafted Spear
444.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.  
Cooldown: 1.
444.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
444.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
444.flavor: Hold that spear up, weakling! Not a single horse shall pass!

445.name: Parasite
445.ability: Damage an enemy by 6, or boost an ally by 6.
445.ability_html: Damage an enemy by 6, or boost an ally by 6.

446.name: Winch
446.ability: Play a bronze Machine from your graveyard.
446.ability_html: Play a bronze Machine from your graveyard.
446.flavor: It's a winch. Not much to flap your jaw about.

447.name: Ruehin
447.ability: Deathwish: On turn end, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
447.ability_html: Deathwish: On turn end, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
447.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
447.flavor: No one has ever entered that forest and lived to tell the tale…

448.name: Cadaverine
448.ability:
Zeal.
Order: Destroy self and all units whose power equals Cadaverine's Charge count.
Charge: 0.
Every turn, on turn start, and whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
448.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Destroy self and all units whose power equals Cadaverine's Charge count. Charge: 0. Every turn, on turn start, and whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
448.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
448.flavor: I don't trust my life to chance. I trust it to a thick coating of Cadaverine on my blade.

449.name: Vrygheff
449.ability: Deploy: Trigger the Deploy abilities of adjacent bronze Soldiers.
449.ability_html: Deploy: Trigger the Deploy abilities of adjacent bronze Soldiers.
449.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
449.flavor: An eye for an eye only ends when the whole world's blind.

450.name: Pavko Gale
450.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
450.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
450.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
450.flavor: No one smuggled as much food to the elves of the Blue Mountains as Gale. He'd bring them sacks of turnips and, prized most of all, leeks.

451.name: Paulie Dahlberg
451.ability: Order: Boost the unit on the left by 4, or give the unit on the right Immune.
451.ability_html: Order: Boost the unit on the left by 4, or give the unit on the right Immune.
451.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Immune: Cannot be targeted.
451.flavor: Move yer arses! It's a ploughin' trap!

452.name: Black Blood
452.ability: The next time an enemy receives a boost, destroy that unit and self.
452.ability_html: The next time an enemy receives a boost, destroy that unit and self.
452.flavor: Vampires all agree: use of this potion is bad sportsmanship.

453.name: Ozzrel
453.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy, Ranged: Consume a unit from your graveyard.
453.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard. Deploy, Ranged: Consume a unit from your graveyard.
453.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
453.flavor: Some necrophages have taken such a liking to human flesh, they no longer are content to merely dig up corpses...

454.name: Bridge Troll
454.ability: Deathwish: Boost the highest ally by 4.
454.ability_html: Deathwish: Boost the highest ally by 4.
454.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
454.flavor: This here bridge? Trolls built it a long time ago. Sat under it, made folk pay 'em a hefty copper to pass. Thing is, not many folk pass this way. So they all packed up, went their way. Not the bridge, though. It stayed.

455.name: Barbegazi
455.ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charge: 2.
455.ability_html: Order: Consume an allied unit. Charge: 2.
455.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
455.flavor: What moments before looked like round rocks among the stalagmites now stared at him with enormous, bright, menacing eyes.

456.name: Scout
456.ability: Deploy: Remove a row effect from an allied row.
456.ability_html: Deploy: Remove a row effect from an allied row.
456.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
456.flavor: If our scouts don't come back, we turn around. The yokels claim these woods are full o' squirrels - and I don't mean the nut-gatherin' kind.

457.name: Equalize
457.ability: Damage all enemies with odd power by 2.
457.ability_html: Damage all enemies with odd power by 2.
457.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

458.name: Disrupt
458.ability: Damage all enemies with even power by 2.
458.ability_html: Damage all enemies with even power by 2.
458.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

459.name: Shupe: Mage
459.ability: Send Shupe to the Ban Ard Academy for Boys.
459.ability_html: Send Shupe to the Ban Ard Academy for Boys.
459.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

460.name: Shupe: Mage
460.ability: Deploy: Transform the rightmost card in each player's hand into a random special card.
460.ability_html: Deploy: Transform the rightmost card in each player's hand into a random special card.
460.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
460.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

461.name: Shupe: Mage
461.ability: Deploy: Move a random unit to the opposite row.
461.ability_html: Deploy: Move a random unit to the opposite row.
461.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
461.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

462.name: Shupe: Mage
462.ability: Deploy: Apply a random row effect to all rows.
462.ability_html: Deploy: Apply a random row effect to all rows.
462.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
462.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

463.name: Shupe: Mage
463.ability: Deploy: Split 13 damage randomly between all other units on the battlefield.
463.ability_html: Deploy: Split 13 damage randomly between all other units on the battlefield.
463.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
463.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

464.name: Shupe: Mage
464.ability: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a random unit to a random row on each side.
464.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a random unit to a random row on each side.
464.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
464.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

465.name: Shupe: Hunter
465.ability: Send Shupe to the forests of Dol Blathanna.
465.ability_html: Send Shupe to the forests of Dol Blathanna.
465.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

466.name: Shupe: Hunter
466.ability: Deploy: Play a random card from your deck.
466.ability_html: Deploy: Play a random card from your deck.
466.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
466.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

467.name: Shupe: Hunter
467.ability: Deploy: Split 9 damage randomly between all enemy units.
467.ability_html: Deploy: Split 9 damage randomly between all enemy units.
467.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
467.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

468.name: Shupe: Hunter
468.ability: Deploy: Boost all units in your hand between 1 and 2 power.
468.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all units in your hand between 1 and 2 power.
468.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
468.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

469.name: Shupe: Hunter
469.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy a random enemy.
469.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
469.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

470.name: Shupe: Hunter
470.ability: Deploy: Apply a random row effect to an enemy row.
470.ability_html: Deploy: Apply a random row effect to an enemy row.
470.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
470.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

471.name: Shupe: Knight
471.ability: Send Shupe to the Imperial Court Military Academy.
471.ability_html: Send Shupe to the Imperial Court Military Academy.
471.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

472.name: Shupe: Knight
472.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 4.
472.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
472.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

473.name: Shupe: Knight
473.ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit.
473.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a card’s abilities and removes other statuses. Disables and flips over face-down cards.
473.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

474.name: Shupe: Knight
474.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the board at round end, then restores it to base power if boosted.
474.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

475.name: Shupe: Knight
475.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact.
475.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
475.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

476.name: Shupe: Knight
476.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 4.
476.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
476.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?

477.name: Arachas Queen
477.ability: Whenever an allied unit is destroyed during your turn, Spawn an Arachas Drone and Summon it to a random allied row.
477.ability_html: Whenever an allied unit is destroyed during your turn, Spawn an Arachas Drone and Summon it to a random allied row.
477.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).

478.name: Spores
478.ability: Restore a unit to its base power.
478.ability_html: Restore a unit to its base power.
478.flavor: Carried by the wind across the Continent... Sowing madness and blight where they fall.

479.name: Foltest's Pride
479.ability:
Order, Melee: Damage an enemy and all other enemies with power equal to it by 1. 
Charge: 1.
479.ability_html: Order, Melee: Damage an enemy and all other enemies with power equal to it by 1. Charge: 1.
479.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
479.flavor: As King Foltest likes to say, it's not size that counts, but whether it gets the job done.

480.name: Golden Froth
480.ability: Boost all units on a row by 2.
480.ability_html: Boost all units on a row by 2.
480.flavor: Smell that? That's the smell of happiness.

481.name: Peasant Militia
481.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an ally by 2.
481.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
481.flavor: We's the militia. We keep the peace.

482.name: Geralt: Professional
482.ability: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 3. If its power was a multiple of 3, destroy it instead.
482.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 3. If its power was a multiple of 3, destroy it instead.
482.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
482.flavor: I accepted a job once, did it. Asked to choose my reward, I invoked the Law of Surprise.

483.name: Triss: Telekinesis
483.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Create and play a bronze special card from either player's current deck.
483.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Create and play a bronze special card from either player's current deck.
483.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly chosen cards from a specified faction and from neutral cards, unless otherwise specified.
483.flavor: Bindings won't suffice. Nor will a gag render her any less dangerous. No, dimeritium is the only solution.

484.name: Dandelion: Vainglory
484.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy Beast.
484.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
484.flavor: Dandelion told me all about your adventures. How he'd ready you for battle with his songs, how he tamed the kayran by playin' his lute...

485.name: Dandelion: Poet
485.ability: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.
485.ability_html: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.
485.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
485.flavor: The quill is mightier than the sword.

486.name: Roche: Merciless
486.ability:
Order: Seize an enemy whose power is less than or equal to Roche Merciless' Charge count, then remove all Charges. 
Charge: 0.
Every turn, on turn start, gain 1 Charge.
486.ability_html: Order: Seize an enemy whose power is less than or equal to Roche Merciless' Charge count, then remove all Charges. Charge: 0. Every turn, on turn start, gain 1 Charge.
486.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Seize: Move an enemy to the opposite row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
486.flavor: Fear does not befit us. Yet, there is a certain d'hoine... Vernon Roche. Be wary of him.

487.name: Call of the Forest
487.ability: Shuffle an allied unit into your deck, then play a unit with the same primary category from your deck and boost it by 3.
487.ability_html: Shuffle an allied unit into your deck, then play a unit with the same primary category from your deck and boost it by 3.
487.flavor: I hold Brokilon dearer than my own life. She is a mother who cares for her children. I will defend her to my final breath.

488.name: Yennefer: Divination
488.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an ally by its power.
488.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an ally by its power.
488.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
488.flavor: Yes, I have seen the future. And you're not in it.

489.name: Imlerith
489.ability:
Order: If you control the highest unit, damage a unit by 2. 
Cooldown: 1.
489.ability_html: Order: If you control the highest unit, damage a unit by 2. Cooldown: 1.
489.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
489.flavor: The sisters said you would come. They saw you arrive in the water's surface.

490.name: Ihuarraquax
490.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Each player Summons the unit with the highest Recruit Cost from their deck to the melee row.
Deploy, Ranged: Each player Summons the unit with the lowest Recruit Cost from their deck to the ranged row.
490.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Each player Summons the unit with the highest Recruit Cost from their deck to the melee row. Deploy, Ranged: Each player Summons the unit with the lowest Recruit Cost from their deck to the ranged row.
490.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
490.flavor: Inconceivable. Impossible, Ciri thought, returning to her senses. Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct.

491.name: Gimpy Gerwin
491.ability: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy and all copies of it by 3.
491.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy and all copies of it by 3.
491.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
491.flavor: Keep the vermin on a short leash. And don't be afraid to use that whip!

492.name: Elf and Onion Soup
492.ability: Destroy 2 allied units of the same color, then Create and play a unit of that color.
492.ability_html: Destroy 2 allied units of the same color, then Create and play a unit of that color.
492.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly chosen cards from a specified faction and from neutral cards, unless otherwise specified.
492.flavor: Garnish each serving with grated cheese. Add eyeballs to taste. Serve hot.

493.name: Ivo of Belhaven
493.ability:
Order, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Witcher.
493.ability_html: Order, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Witcher.
493.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
493.flavor: It's not reason I'm devoid of, just emotion.

494.name: Eyck of Denesle
494.ability:
Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal.
Order: Destroy a unit with 8 or more power.
494.ability_html: Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal. Order: Destroy a unit with 8 or more power.
494.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
494.flavor: The Good Book says the world is a garden which the gods once conferred upon man. And we men have this garden neglected!

495.name: Gascon
495.ability: Deploy, Melee: Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
495.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
495.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
495.flavor: Th' Strays of Spalla – 'tis you who lead them? 'Tis you they call the Duke of Dogs?

496.name: Prince Villem
496.ability:
Spying.
Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
496.ability_html: Spying. Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
496.keyword_html: Spying: Status for a unit played on or moved to the opposite side of the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
496.flavor: The boy's not fit to wear the crown. Hasn't sufficient wit nor valor. I know this, you know this… just, he knows it not.

497.name: Count Caldwell
497.ability: Every turn, on turn end, move to the row with the highest unit on the battlefield.
497.ability_html: Every turn, on turn end, move to the row with the highest unit on the battlefield.
497.flavor: Your Majesty… For the queen to question commoners, why, it's simply not proper…

498.name: Xavier Lemmens
498.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Banish all cards in your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy, Ranged: Banish all cards in your graveyard.
498.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Banish all cards in your opponent's graveyard. Deploy, Ranged: Banish all cards in your graveyard.
498.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
498.flavor: Your engineer's got a pate like stewed meat, but he kens his trade, that's for certain.

499.name: Keltullis
499.ability: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
499.ability_html: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
499.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
499.flavor: When he took roost here, they fought 'im for near a century. Then the dragon got weary o' fightin' and they realized he weren't goin' nowheres, so… they cut a deal. He dinnae bother 'em, they give 'im what he needs.

500.name: Frightener: Awake
500.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

501.name: Glustyworp
501.ability: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
501.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
501.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
501.flavor: The swamp underfoot suddenly exploded with a powerful splash. Two long, mantis-like forelimbs bristling with spikes shot out from the murk. The monstrous, green hooks seized an unlucky footman, dragging him beneath the water's surface.

502.name: Gabor Zigrin
502.ability:
Deploy, Melee: Gain Resilience.
Deploy, Ranged: Gain Immune.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
502.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Gain Resilience. Deploy, Ranged: Gain Immune. Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
502.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the board at round end, then restores it to base power if boosted. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Immune: Cannot be targeted.
502.flavor: Brouver Hoog wanted to kick him out of Mahakam once for having a llama in his living room… it's a long story.

503.name: Barnabas Beckenbauer
503.ability: Deploy: Boost an Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad ally by 2.
503.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad ally by 2.
503.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
503.flavor: Arrived here with his peddler's wagon full o' tricks an' gadgets. Went from house tae house, praised his rubbish tae the high heavens. An' what's it he sold us? Bombs that go off in yer hand! Beard-growth formula that makes yer hair catch fire!

504.name: Isbel of Hagge
504.ability: Order, Ranged: Look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
504.ability_html: Order, Ranged: Look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
504.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
504.flavor: I promised I would never again use magic to harm others.

505.name: Lippy Gudmund
505.ability: Deploy, Ranged: Swap your graveyard with your deck.
505.ability_html: Deploy, Ranged: Swap your graveyard with your deck.
505.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
505.flavor: The coast's picked clean since long! So we set our longships up the Yaruga – for gold and glory!

506.name: Dagur Two Blades
506.ability: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
506.ability_html: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
506.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.

507.name: Traheaern var Vdyffir
507.ability: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
507.ability_html: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
507.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
507.flavor: The Nilfgaardians proceeded in the queen's very direction without a sign of panic. The man leading the Nilfgaardians was clad in rich robes. He exuded pride... and the scent of musk.

508.name: Reynard Odo
508.ability: Whenever an allied unit with Charge is played, give it 1 Charge.
508.ability_html: Whenever an allied unit with Charge is played, give it 1 Charge.
508.keyword_html: Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
508.flavor: Under your husband I served ten years, under you another eight. And never in that time did I fight for a more worthy cause.

509.name: Black Rayla
509.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by the number of Human allies.
509.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by the number of Human allies.
509.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
509.flavor: Exceptions are a clear road to human blood spilt. All Scoia'tael must die. Leave the gods to sort the wheat from the chaff.

510.name: Phoenix Hatchling
510.ability:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Transform into Phoenix.
510.ability_html: Doomed. Zeal. Order: Transform into Phoenix.
510.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
510.flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.

511.name: Strays of Spalla
511.ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
511.ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
511.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.

512.name: Bomb Heaver
512.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact.
512.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
512.flavor: Knew a young couple once—got separated right after the weddin'. Bomb in the carriage'll do that.

513.name: Tactical Advantage
513.ability:
Immune.
Order: Boost an ally by 5, then Banish self.
If moved away from the battlefield, Banish self.
513.ability_html: Immune. Order: Boost an ally by 5, then Banish self. If moved away from the battlefield, Banish self.
513.keyword_html: Immune: Cannot be targeted. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
513.flavor: Remember, cadets! He who first draws his blade has the advantage over his foe!

514.name: King Demavend III
514.ability:
Order: Give 1 Charge to a unit. 
Cooldown: 2.
514.ability_html: Order: Give 1 Charge to a unit. Cooldown: 2.
514.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
514.flavor: My king enjoys life... enjoys pleasures and indulges often. But none of this has hindered his ability to govern the realm bloody well.

515.name: Angoulême
515.ability: Order: Play a random artifact from your opponent's deck.
515.ability_html: Order: Play a random artifact from your opponent's deck.
515.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
515.flavor: Don't matter if it crawls, slithers, climbs—you name it, I've eaten it. As for things that fly... I once ate a kite just 'cause it had flour stuck to it.

516.name: Vysogota of Corvo
516.ability:
Zeal.
Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
516.ability_html: Zeal. Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
516.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
516.flavor: It's been near half a century since I last practiced medicine. The years haven't been kind to my memory... Nor the dexterity of my fingers.

517.name: Falibor
517.ability: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy unit with Orders.
517.ability_html: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy unit with Orders.
517.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
517.flavor: From afar, he looks like a bear. From up close, well... A larger bear.

518.name: Anna Strenger
518.ability: If on turn end this unit is boosted, boost adjacent units by 1.
518.ability_html: If on turn end this unit is boosted, boost adjacent units by 1.
518.flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.

519.name: Lyrian Cavalry
519.ability: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
519.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
519.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
519.flavor: A horseman's worth no less than his steed. And Lyrian horses are among the Continent's best.

520.name: Rivian Pikeman
520.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If it was destroyed, damage another enemy by 3.
520.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If it was destroyed, damage another enemy by 3.
520.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
520.flavor: Get off your high horse and face me!

521.name: Lyrian Arbalest
521.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
521.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1. Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
521.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
521.flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...

522.name: Lyrian Landsknecht
522.ability: Order: Damage a unit by 1. If Lyrian Landsknecht is boosted, damage a unit by 3 instead.
522.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. If Lyrian Landsknecht is boosted, damage a unit by 3 instead.
522.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.
522.flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.

523.name: Lyrian Scytheman
523.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted ally.
523.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted ally.
523.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
523.flavor: Our folk they feed, and our foes they bleed.
